name: Healthy Homemade Granola
ingredients: ¼ cup coconut oil, ¼ cup honey or pure maple syrup for vegan option, ½ tsp pure vanilla extract, 2 cups old-fashioned oats, ½ cup unsweetened shredded coconut, ½ cup raw pecans chopped, 2 tsp ground cinnamon, ½ tsp sea salt
